trans-unit.source: Enables security checking on calls to a component.
trans-unit.target: 启用安全检查对组件的调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute.Value*> property to indicate whether to enable COM+ security configuration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute"></xref>类并设置<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute.Value*>属性以指示是否启用 COM + 安全配置。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable security checking on calls to a component; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要启用的安全检查在调用组件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to enable security checking on calls to a component.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用的安全检查对组件的调用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security checking is to be enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果安全检查，则启用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
